name: CMIOExtensionPropertyState
desc: An object that describes the state of a property.

items.name: init(value: ObjectType?)
items.desc: Creates a property state with a value.

items.name: init(value: ObjectType?, attributes: CMIOExtensionPropertyAttributes<ObjectType>?)
items.desc: Creates a property state with a value and attributes.

items.name: var value: ObjectType?
items.desc: The value for a property state.

items.name: var attributes: CMIOExtensionPropertyAttributes<ObjectType>?
items.desc: The attributes for a property state.

declaration: class CMIOExtensionPropertyState<ObjectType> : NSObject where ObjectType : AnyObject
